content:
, for which it would
be useful to stipulate a name. Explain how the name would be useful.
EXERCISEVI



348
CHAPTER 14 ■Fallacies of Ambiguity
Give precising definitions for the following words. In each case, supply a con-
text that gives your precising definition a point.
1.  book
2.  alcoholic beverage
3.  crime
4.  warm
5.  fast
EXERCISEVII
Give disambiguating definitions for the following words. In each case, supply
a context in which your definition might be needed to avoid confusion.
1.  r
